text: Hey Muniza, I hope you’re well. I just wanted to let you know that I am taking my anual leave from tomorrow until the 27th, so don’t worry if you don’t see me reply ;)
Hi Chloe! I'm doing okay! Thank you for letting me know and sorry for not replying to you sooner :disappointed:

In regards to your previous message, I chose this sound clip because I feel like it has potential to be animated comedically. The dialogue works well to create an anticipation before an exagerrated reaction to the object/thing the character is reacting to. In the original footage, the speaker is playing a game but I was hoping to have the object be something like a baby or dead animal/game aha :sweat_smile::joy:

wow! triathlon looks intense! :open_mouth: I'm interesting in more boring sports such as badminton aha :sweat_smile: although i want to push myself further and try other things. One of my uni housemates usually goes for a run in the evenings and my other house mate would go to yoga club at university. I realised I havnt fully looked into the different sports clubs and societies at my university so I think I a good starting point would be to research those as they. I think signing up to some of those classes would keep me motivated too aha.

I follow an animation youtuber who attends kick boxing classes. Seeing her "A Day in my Life" video really motivated me start organising my workload better and maybe even try kick boxing :laughing: I think the self-defense aspect of it is what appeals to me.

And yes! I completely agree with you about there being other studios like Blue Zoo outside of London :smile: I've been researching some more of those and was surprised to see how many studios do cute and stylised work like Blue Zoo. I think at university, they talk to us about all the larger, more well known studios and that they all tend to be in London so it becomes easy to forget that not all work is in London aha
I hope you have a nice break and will get back to you soon with animation update! :sunny::beach_with_umbrella::shell:

Oh! i forgot to mention that I also chose that audio clip because I watch game grumps and they do a lot of gaming content. I guess gaming and watching game grumps is also a hobby of mine so in that sense, that audio clip is also personal to me in terms of my taste aha
